title.rendered: Career Opportunities with Smile Foundation NGO

content.rendered:
Join the Smile Team

Do you also believe in the cause of education for all?

Then come join our crusade and embark on a rewarding and satisfying journey with Smile Foundation.

At Smile, “Real Work, Real Change” is our ethos. Working on the ground to bring sustainable change is not easy, but in our country where more than half of the population is deprived even of its basic needs, this is where we must start. Before we debate on human rights, we must address urgent human needs. And this is what Smile Foundation has been tirelessly striving to achieve. Through intensive programmes based on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, we work towards bringing positive and long lasting change in the lives of children and their families.

People – committed, passionate individuals have always been at the core of all we do. Currently, we have a team of over 400 full-time professionals from diverse backgrounds working across India at our projects and offices.

If you wish to be a part of the change process at the grassroots, and are willing to build a career in the development sector through professional value creation, we will be happy to hear from you.

FIND A POSITION

FIND A POSITION

PROGRAMMES
Position Location
National Manager- Health Programs New Delhi
Community Health Officer/Project Officer Bangalore, Nasik, Kolkata & Pune
RESOURCES
Position Location
Executive/Sr. Executive/ Assistant Manager Delhi
Sr Manager/Manager- New Acquisitions – Corporate Partnerships (B2B) Delhi/Mumbai/Bangalore
Executive, Telecalling Delhi
Executive/Sr. Executive/Asst. Manager/Manager Mumbai, Kolkata, Gujarat, Indore & Bangalore
Manager – Corporate Partnerships (B2B)/Fund Raising Mumbai, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Delhi
Asst. Manager/Manager Resource Mobilisaiton Bhubaneswar (Odisha)
Lead – Collaboration New Delhi
Manager – Corporate Partnerships (B2B)/Fund Raising/Sustainable Development Mumbai and Hyderabad
Fundraising (School Fundraising) Lucknow/Chennai/Bangalore/Mumbai
COMMUNICATION

Sorry, we have no current openings. Please mail your resume to jobs@smilefoundationindia.org and we will consider your profile for suitable positions in the future.

FINANCE
Position Location
Manager New Delhi, Head Office
Finance Executive New Delhi, Head Office
HUMAN RESOURCE
Position Location
Executive/ Sr. Executive – Human Resources New Delhi
ADMIN

Sorry, we have no current openings. Please mail your resume to jobs@smilefoundationindia.org and we will consider your profile for suitable positions in the future.

OTHERS

Sorry, we have no current openings. Please mail your resume to jobs@smilefoundationindia.org and we will consider your profile for suitable positions in the future.

Smilians Forever

H.N.Sahay

Former Director – Development

I joined the Organization (Year 2010) when it was working hard to re-settle after some jerks and patches surfaced at a senior employee level. I was suddenly driven into exercises meant for system corrections and up gradation. 

Mudita Srivastava

Former Assistant Manager – Communication

I have been fortunate enough to be a part of Smile Foundation (Delhi , HO) as Assistant Manager in the Media & PR team. The good part about this place is that it gives you the space to work and experiment. the best part is yet to come.

Kavita Tiwari

Former Manager – Alliances & institutional Relations

My experience with Smile Foundation has been extremely enriching. Smile’s open environment offers numerous learning opportunities. An approachable management, and versatile colleagues make Smile a great place to work. 

Anindita Majumder

Former Manager – Communication

These days we spend more time at work than we do at home. And we all look for a workplace that we could make our second home. A place that is friendly, encouraging, appreciating, et al. Well I found my second home at Smile. 

Manju Menon

Former AGM – Programmes

My association with Smile Foundation has been an enriching and satisfying experience. The jobs and roles that I held gave me the platform to identity and explore my potential, and use it effectively. I also got exposure to new areas of work

Watch Smilians in Action

Recent Activities

Capacity Building & Training
